tutorials.title: About this Tutorial
tutorials.description: This tutorial walks you through the steps of creating a hands on lab(HOL).

tutorials.title: Lab 01: Getting Started with GitHub
tutorials.description: This tutorial walks you through the steps of setting up a GitHub development environment.

tutorials.title: Lab 02: Creating the Structure of Markdown Labs
tutorials.description: This tutorial walks you through the steps of creating project folders and files.

tutorials.title: Lab 03: Using Markdown Templates
tutorials.description: This tutorial walks you through the steps of using the content.md template.

tutorials.title: Lab 04: Creating Learning Paths
tutorials.description: This tutorial walks you through the steps of combining multiple tutorials to form a learning path.
